title: SEO-only optimization for all tool pages (exclude EMI & Loan calculators)

requirements.text: Update route-level SEO metadata for every specified tool route (Age Calculator, BMI Calculator, SIP Calculator, GST Calculator, Percentage Calculator, JPG to PDF, PNG to JPG, JPG to PNG, Merge PDF, Split PDF, Compress PDF, PDF to Image, Image Compressor, Image Converter, Resize Image) so that each route has a unique SEO-friendly document title (max 60 characters) that starts with "Free" and naturally includes the main keyword, and a unique meta description that is 150–160 characters and includes the main keyword. Do not change SEO metadata for the EMI Calculator route or the Loan Calculator route.

quotes: Apply SEO optimization to ALL tool pages except EMI Calculator and Loan Calculator (these are already optimized).
Create a unique SEO-friendly title (max 60 characters) starting with "Free" and including the main keyword naturally.
Add a unique 150-160 character meta description including the main keyword.
Ensure each page has a DIFFERENT title and DIFFERENT meta description.
Do NOT modify EMI Calculator or Loan Calculator pages.

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/utils/seo.ts, TOOL_SEO contains entries for all of these paths: /age-calculator, /tools/bmi-calculator, /sip-calculator, /tools/gst-calculator, /tools/percentage-calculator, /jpg-to-pdf, /tools/png-to-jpg, /tools/jpg-to-png, /tools/pdf-merge, /tools/pdf-split, /tools/compress-pdf, /tools/pdf-to-image, /image-compressor, /tools/image-converter, /tools/image-resizer.
For each of the above paths, the title string starts with "Free" and is <= 60 characters.

For each of the above paths, the description string is between 150 and 160 characters inclusive (counting spaces) and includes the tool’s main keyword (e.g., "BMI calculator", "SIP calculator", "merge PDF").
No two titles are identical across the updated tool pages, and no two meta descriptions are identical across the updated tool pages.
Entries for /emi-calculator and /tools/loan-calculator are not changed from their current values.

requirements.text: For each specified tool page component (Age Calculator, BMI Calculator, SIP Calculator, GST Calculator, Percentage Calculator, JPG to PDF, PNG to JPG, JPG to PNG, Merge PDF, Split PDF, Compress PDF, PDF to Image, Image Compressor, Image Converter, Resize Image), update only on-screen SEO copy so that (a) the H1 remains keyword-focused and matches the page topic, and (b) a professional 3–4 line SEO introduction paragraph appears above each tool explaining what it does and naturally including the main keyword. Do not change any URL, design, layout, or tool functionality. Do not modify EMI Calculator or Loan Calculator pages.

quotes: Keep the H1 keyword-focused and matching the page topic.
Add a 3-4 line SEO introduction paragraph above each tool explaining what it does and including the main keyword naturally.
Do NOT change any URL, design, layout, or tool functionality.
Do NOT modify EMI Calculator or Loan Calculator pages.

acceptanceCriteria: The following files are updated only in user-facing SEO text (titles/headings/intro paragraphs), with no functional logic changes: frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/AgeCalculatorPage.tsx, BmiCalculatorPage.tsx, SipCalculatorPage.tsx, GstCalculatorPage.tsx, PercentageCalculatorPage.tsx; frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/JpgToPdfPage.tsx, PdfMergePage.tsx, PdfSplitPage.tsx, CompressPdfPage.tsx, PdfToImagePage.tsx; frontend/src/pages/tools/image/JpgToPngPage.tsx, PngToJpgPage.tsx, ImageCompressorPage.tsx, ImageConverterPage.tsx, ImageResizerPage.tsx.
Each of the specified pages displays a keyword-focused H1 that matches the tool topic (e.g., "Free BMI Calculator", "Free Merge PDF Tool"), and it is not replaced with unrelated wording.
Each of the specified pages includes a new or revised 3–4 line introduction paragraph above the tool UI that describes the tool and naturally includes the main keyword for that page.
No changes are made to routes/URLs, component structure that would alter layout, styling classes, or tool processing behavior; only textual SEO content is changed.
No changes are made to frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/EmiCalculatorPage.tsx or frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/LoanCalculatorPage.tsx.

constraints: Do not change any URL/route constants or route paths.
Do not change design, layout, styling, or tool functionality; update SEO text only.
Do not modify EMI Calculator or Loan Calculator pages (including on-screen copy) and do not change their existing SEO metadata entries.
nonGoals: Adding new pages, new tools, or changing tool categories/navigation.
Changing sitemap.xml or robots.txt behavior beyond what is required for SEO copy updates.
Implementing structured data (JSON-LD), OpenGraph/Twitter tags, or server-side rendering.
